DomainName.description: Domain name to be associated with this CDN.

CertificateARN.description: ARN of the custom certificate configure with this distribution. The certificate should cover the provided domain name.

RestrictAccess.description: If set to 'true' the content will only be available with pre-signed URLs or cookies. The private RSA key and the Key Id will be stored in Secret Manager. Use the 'KeysSecret' output parameter to get the secret ARN and access the keys in your app.

RetainContent.description: If enabled, the S3 bucket and the content stored in the bucket will be retained.

EnableCORS.description: If enabled, the requests will be allowed from any domain from the browser.

AllowOrigins.description: Comma delimited list of origins. E.g. example.com,example2.com
